en: Your beauty turns me pale.
zh: 你的美貌让我黯然失色。

en: He looks like your brother.
zh: 他看起来像你哥哥。

en: Leave it alone!
zh: 别管它！

en: This is your responsibility. It's not the kind of thing you can laugh off.
zh: 这是你的责任。这不是你可以一笑置之的事情。

en: She sets your world alight.
zh: 她点亮了你的世界。

en: You are soul needs rescue.
zh: 你的灵魂需要拯救。

en: Your soul has been condemned to hell.
zh: 你的灵魂已被判入地狱。

en: Your soul needs rescue.
zh: 你的灵魂需要拯救。

en: Your behavior brought disgrace on our family.
zh: 你的行为给我们的家庭带来了耻辱。

en: Your heart's beating, alive and beating.
zh: 你的心脏在跳动，鲜活地跳动着。

en: You have caused me to lose my temper.
zh: 你让我失去了理智。

en: This is your fault.
zh: 这是你的错。

en: You are two-faced.
zh: 你是个两面派。

en: I can wait for you.
zh: 我可以等你。

en: I will make a new suit for you.
zh: 我会为你做一套新西装。

en: I'm quite out of patience with you.
zh: 我对你已经完全失去耐心了。

en: You shall have my car.
zh: 我的车给你用。

en: I'm counting on you.
zh: 我指望你了。

en: I'm no match for you.
zh: 我不是你的对手。

en: Can't you hear the sound?
zh: 你听不到声音吗？

en: I know you don't care.
zh: 我知道你不在乎。

en: I've got no time to sit and talk.
zh: 我没时间坐下来聊天。

en: I know you can make it better.
zh: 我知道你能把它做得更好。

en: I know you can make it.
zh: 我知道你能做到。

en: Where were you loafing?
zh: 你刚才在哪儿闲逛？

en: It seems you and I are essential to this project. We'd better get along or it'll go badly.
zh: 看来你和我对这个项目至关重要。我们最好相处融洽，否则事情会变得很糟糕。

en: You noisy children will be chucked off by the driver.
zh: 你们这些吵闹的孩子会被司机赶下去的。

en: I saw the picture you took of that fish.
zh: 我看到了你拍的那条鱼的照片。

en: You just made me miss the perfect shot when you hollered.
zh: 你一喊叫，害我错过了完美的镜头。

en: If you act like a child, you will be treated as such.
zh: 如果你表现得像个孩子，你就会被当成孩子对待。

en: That's my own affair.
zh: 那是我的私事。

en: You are wrong.
zh: 你错了。

en: There's no need for you to butt in. Just let him do this on his own.
zh: 没必要你插手。就让他自己做吧。

en: You talk so fast I can't understand a word you say.
zh: 你说话太快了，我一句也听不懂。

en: You are drunk!
zh: 你喝醉了！

en: You're overworked.
zh: 你工作过度了。

en: You should go ahead and do it, just like you said you would.
zh: 你应该去做，就像你答应的那样。

en: You should have seen yourself, yawning all through the meeting.
zh: 你应该看看你自己，整个会议都在打哈欠。

en: Good-bye!
zh: 再见！

en: You're out of it.
zh: 你神志不清。

en: It's in the overhead compartment.
zh: 在头顶的行李舱里。

en: We'll call you when your table is ready.
zh: 当你的桌子准备好时，我们会打电话给你。

en: What are you planning to do for the New Year vacation?
zh: 你打算新年假期做什么？

en: I am greatly indebted to you for all you have done for me.
zh: 我非常感谢你为我所做的一切。

en: I really appreciate your kindness.
zh: 我真的很感激你的好意。

en: It has always been a pleasure to work with you.
zh: 一直以来，与你合作都很愉快。

en: There is nothing to be gained by flattery.
zh: 奉承是没有任何好处的。

en: Complimenting is lying.
zh: 赞美就是说谎。

en: Beware of smooth talk.
zh: 小心花言巧语。

en: Could you bring me some water?
zh: 你能给我拿些水吗？

en: Can I have some water, please?
zh: 请给我来点水。

en: Could I get some water, please?
zh: 请给我来点水好吗？

en: May I have a glass of water?
zh: 我可以要一杯水吗？

en: Just water, please.
zh: 就要水，谢谢。

en: The rights you requested do not belong to us.
zh: 您请求的权限不属于我们。

en: May I have the honor of asking you?
zh: 我可以荣幸地请教您吗？

en: I'd like a doll, a new bicycle.....and peace on earth!
zh: 我想要一个娃娃，一辆新自行车......还有世界和平！

en: No gratuity accepted.
zh: 不收小费。

en: Thank you again for your good thoughts.
zh: 再次感谢您的好意。

en: Thanks so much for your good thoughts.
zh: 非常感谢您的好意。

en: I'm very grateful for your sympathy.
zh: 我非常感谢您的同情。

en: This way, please, mademoiselle.
zh: 这边请，小姐。

en: What's your daughter's name?
zh: 你女儿叫什么名字？

en: Your daughter passed the examination, I hear.
zh: 听说你女儿通过了考试。

en: I ask to see your daughter.
zh: 我想见见你的女儿。

en: Would you like a ride?
zh: 要搭车吗？

en: It was kind of you to invite us.
zh: 您邀请我们真是太好了。

en: Thank you very much for your invitation.
zh: 非常感谢您的邀请。

en: What size do you wear?
zh: 你穿什么尺码？

en: This accident has nothing to do with me, officer.
zh: 警官，这起事故与我无关。

en: Here comes a copper!
zh: 警察来了！

en: I am pleased at your coming.
zh: 我很高兴你的到来。

en: Let's have sushi.
zh: 我们去吃寿司吧。

en: You can't drive. You've been drinking.
zh: 你不能开车。你喝酒了。

en: It was gracious of you to accept.
zh: 您接受真是太好了。

en: Can I drink alcohol?
zh: 我可以喝酒吗？

en: Let's have sake.
zh: 我们喝清酒吧。

en: As he was drinking he got very merry and kept telling everybody just how much he hated hospitals.
zh: 他喝着喝着就高兴起来了，不停地告诉大家他有多讨厌医院。

en: No drinkers.
zh: 不喝酒的人。

en: Liquor will have an effect on a person.
zh: 酒会对人产生影响。

en: The minute I have something to drink, I turn bright red.
zh: 我一喝酒，脸就变得通红。

en: Do you drink alcohol?
zh: 你喝酒吗？

en: Everybody has their favorite drink.
zh: 每个人都有自己喜欢的饮料。

en: Drinking too much is bad for the health.
zh: 喝太多酒对健康不好。

en: I can't help you. As a matter of fact, I'm very busy just now.
zh: 我帮不了你。事实上，我现在很忙。

en: Shall I help you?
zh: 我帮你吗？

en: I am willing to help you.
zh: 我愿意帮助你。

en: I said, "Is there anything I can do?"
zh: 我说，“有什么我可以做的吗？”

en: I asked you if you wanted some help.
zh: 我问你是否需要帮助。

en: Let me help you.
zh: 让我来帮你。

en: The maid was dead tired of her household chores.
zh: 女仆厌倦了家务，累得要死。

en: The maid immediately cleaned the dishes from the table.
zh: 女仆立刻收拾了桌子上的盘子。

en: The servants tried to carry out their master's order.
zh: 仆人们试图执行主人的命令。

en: The maid made my bed.
zh: 女仆铺了我的床。

en: It's very decent of you to help me.
zh: 你帮我真是太好了。

en: I'd be very grateful if you'd help me.
zh: 如果你能帮我，我将非常感激。

en: Could you help me?
zh: 你能帮我吗？

en: It's very kind of you to help me.
zh: 你帮我真是太好了。

en: Thank you for your assistance.
zh: 谢谢你的帮助。

en: May I use the bathroom?
zh: 我可以用一下洗手间吗？

en: Could you show me where the bathroom is?
zh: 请问洗手间在哪里？

en: May I trouble you to pass me the salt?
zh: 麻烦您把盐递给我好吗？

en: I'm sorry to bother you.
zh: 不好意思打扰您了。

en: I'm at a complete loss!
zh: 我完全不知所措了！

en: Don't be too hard on me, please.
zh: 请不要对我太苛刻。

en: I am in receipt of your letter.
zh: 我收到了您的来信。

en: Thank you very much for your letter.
zh: 非常感谢您的来信。

en: I hereby beg to acknowledge your letter.
zh: 谨此确认收到您的来信。

en: I acknowledged the receipt of your letter.
zh: 我已确认收到您的来信。

en: I received your letter.
zh: 我收到了你的信。

en: I am looking forward to your letter.
zh: 我期待您的来信。

en: Your letter reached me only today, having been delayed by the heavy snow.
zh: 您的信今天才到，因为大雪延误了。

en: Thank you for writing.
zh: 谢谢您的来信。

en: Thank you for your letter.
zh: 谢谢你的信。

en: You're my good omen.
zh: 你真是我的幸运星。

en: Thank you for your business.
zh: 感谢您的惠顾。

en: Would you like me to order it?
zh: 要我来点吗？

en: A young person wants to see you.
zh: 有位年轻人要见你。

en: I am sorry if I disturbed you.
zh: 如果我打扰了你，我很抱歉。

en: I hope I'm not disturbing you.
zh: 我希望我没有打扰你。

en: Thank you very much for your hospitality.
zh: 非常感谢您的款待。

en: I'm sorry to disturb you, but there's a phone call for you.
zh: 打扰您一下，您有电话。

en: I'm sorry to bother you, but I would like to ask you a favor.
zh: 不好意思打扰您，但我想请您帮个忙。

en: Stop putting on an act.
zh: 别再装模作样了。

en: Do you like the theater?
zh: 你喜欢戏剧吗？

en: The custom of bowing is peculiar to the islanders.
zh: 鞠躬是岛民特有的习俗。

en: Do you have a few minutes to spare?
zh: 你有没有几分钟空闲时间？

en: I am sorry to have taken up your valuable time.
zh: 很抱歉占用了您宝贵的时间。

en: Do you have the time?
zh: 现在几点？

en: Please come and see me if you have time.
zh: 有空请来找我。

en: Do you have some time?
zh: 你有没有时间？

en: Is it to go?
zh: 要走了吗？

en: Have mercy on me and spare my life, please!
zh: 请您发发慈悲，饶我一命吧！

en: With reference to the invoice No.56789 which was due last month, we have not yet received your remittance.
zh: 关于上个月到期的56789号发票，我们尚未收到您的汇款。

en: How would you like to pay?
zh: 您想怎么支付？

en: How would you like to pay for it?
zh: 您想怎么付款？

en: We remind you that our terms are 60 days net.
zh: 我们提醒您，我们的付款条件是60天净额。

en: May we therefore ask you for a two months' extension of credit?
zh: 因此，我们可以请求您将信用期限延长两个月吗？

en: Your payment is now two months overdue.
zh: 您的付款现在已经逾期两个月了。

en: Bring your children with you.
zh: 带上你的孩子们一起来吧。

en: I'm sure the children are getting big.
zh: 孩子们一定都长大了。

en: Is the kid still up?
zh: 孩子还在醒着吗？

en: You should build a fire under the kid.
zh: 你得给那孩子点压力。

en: How old are your children?
zh: 你的孩子们多大了？

en: How are you and your wife doing, now that the birds have all flown the coop?
zh: 孩子们都离家了，你和你的妻子现在怎么样？

en: May his life be blessed with health and happiness all through.
zh: 愿他一生健康幸福。

en: Do you have any children?
zh: 你有孩子吗？

en: Please let me pick up your sister at the station.
zh: 请让我去车站接你的妹妹。

en: I feel very sorry for your sister.
zh: 我很同情你的妹妹。

en: Will you give my best regards to your sister?
zh: 请代我向你的妹妹问好。

en: Will you go out on an errand?
zh: 你要出去办事吗？

en: I regret to say I can't come.
zh: 很遗憾，我来不了。

en: How is your work getting along?
zh: 你的工作进展如何？

en: Please wash the dishes.
zh: 请洗碗。

en: Would you put the dishes in the sink?
zh: 你把碗放到水槽里好吗？

en: Eat everything on your plate, or you won't get any dessert.
zh: 把盘子里的东西都吃完，不然你就没甜点了。

en: You'd better eat everything that's on your plate.
zh: 你最好把盘子里的东西都吃完。

en: I'd like to go to Takayama during festival time.
zh: 我想在祭典的时候去高山。

en: The date of the festival coincides with that of the exam.
zh: 祭典的日期和考试的日期重合了。

en: I greatly appreciate your efforts during our festival.
zh: 非常感谢您在祭典期间的努力。

en: Sending year-end gifts is one of the customs peculiar to Japan.
zh: 赠送年终礼物是日本特有的习俗之一。

en: Do you want to sit down?
zh: 你想坐下吗？

en: Pass the sugar, please.
zh: 请递一下糖。

en: I will help you if you are in trouble.
zh: 如果你有麻烦，我会帮助你。

en: I'd be happy to help you if you're having trouble.
zh: 如果你有困难，我很乐意帮助你。

en: Behave yourself.
zh: 规矩点。

en: What language do you speak in your country?
zh: 在你的国家说什么语言？

en: Behave yourself, and you'll get something nice.
zh: 规矩点，你就会得到好东西。

en: Where are your manners?
zh: 你的礼貌呢？

en: What about your manners!
zh: 你的礼貌呢！

en: Watch yourself.
zh: 小心点。

en: I hope you'll be happy forever.
zh: 我希望你永远幸福。

en: My clothes have an oily smell because I ate at an okonomiyaki place.
zh: 我的衣服有油味，因为我在大阪烧店吃了东西。

en: Add salt and pepper to taste.
zh: 根据口味加盐和胡椒。

en: You may call on me whenever you like.
zh: 你随时都可以来找我。

en: Whatever you like.
zh: 随便你。

en: Help yourself to whatever you like.
zh: 随便吃点什么吧。

en: Please help yourself to any food you like.
zh: 请随便吃点什么。

en: Sit wherever you like.
zh: 随便坐。

en: Have a satsuma for dessert.
zh: 饭后吃个橘子吧。

en: Well, do you like it?
zh: 怎么样，你喜欢吗？

en: OK, so that's it for me. Now I'll hand things over to the next speaker.
zh: 好了，我就说到这儿。现在我把话筒交给下一位发言人。

en: We solved the problem by mutual concessions.
zh: 我们通过互相让步解决了问题。

en: The chemistry is right for us.
zh: 我们很合得来。

en: Don't you get on each other's nerves?
zh: 你们不会互相惹恼对方吧？

en: They are bitter enemies.
zh: 他们是死对头。

en: Let's try to understand one another.
zh: 让我们试着互相理解。

en: There must be a better person for both of us.
zh: 我们彼此一定能找到更适合的人。

en: Let's stop finding fault with each other.
zh: 我们别再互相挑刺了。

en: Let's keep in touch with each other.
zh: 我们保持联系。

en: To understand each other is important.
zh: 互相理解很重要。

en: Let's agree to share in the profits.
zh: 我们同意分享利润。

en: Can we effect a compromise?
zh: 我们能达成妥协吗？

en: So there's no love lost between them then?
zh: 所以他们之间没有感情，是吗？

en: It is our duty to help one another.
zh: 互相帮助是我们的责任。

en: I don't like families that quarrel amongst themselves.
zh: 我不喜欢家庭内部争吵。

en: It seems we are in the same boat.
zh: 看来我们是同舟共济。

en: Find mutual interests, and you will get along with each other.
zh: 找到共同的兴趣，你们就会相处融洽。

en: You called?
zh: 你找我？

en: What's the name of the party you're calling?
zh: 你打电话找哪个部门？

en: I will bear your words in mind.
zh: 我会把你的话记在心里的。

en: If you insist, I'll have another drink.
zh: 如果你坚持，我就再喝一杯。

en: I will borrow it then, if you insist.
zh: 如果你坚持，那我就借了。

en: How have you been?
zh: 你最近怎么样？

en: I hope this letter finds you well.
zh: 希望你一切都好。

en: Good luck to you!
zh: 祝你好运！

en: Thank you for coming.
zh: 谢谢你的到来。

en: It's so kind of you to come to see me off.
zh: 你来送我真是太好了。

en: It's nice of you to see me off.
zh: 你来送我真是太好了。

en: Good show!
zh: 好样的！

en: I'm sure people ask you this question all the time, but it's all that comes to mind right now.
zh: 我肯定人们一直都在问你这个问题，但现在我只能想到这个。

en: Here they come.
zh: 他们来了。

en: Do you want the doctors to use the machine to make your brother breathe?
zh: 你希望医生用机器让你弟弟呼吸吗？

en: Can your brother drive a car?
zh: 你弟弟会开车吗？

en: Compared with his brother, he is a poor athlete.
zh: 和他哥哥相比，他是个差劲的运动员。

en: Your brother got married, didn't he?
zh: 你弟弟结婚了，是吧？

en: He wants the money.
zh: 他想要钱。

en: For people who dislike the idea of giving money, a gift certificate is a good idea.
zh: 对于不喜欢送钱的人来说，礼品券是个好主意。

en: I can't lend you any money.
zh: 我不能借给你钱。

en: I will do that work on condition that I get paid for it.
zh: 我做这项工作的前提是得到报酬。

en: I caught a pickpocket dead to rights when he stole my money.
zh: 我当场抓住了偷我钱的扒手。

en: It is wrong to steal money.
zh: 偷钱是不对的。

en: My money was stolen.
zh: 我的钱被偷了。

en: I'm trying to save money.
zh: 我正在努力攒钱。

en: Can you save enough money for the down payment?
zh: 你能攒够首付的钱吗？

en: I can't lend you money, because I don't have any myself.
zh: 我没法借给你钱，因为我自己也没有。

en: Would you lend me some money?
zh: 你能借我点钱吗？

en: All the money spent, we started looking for work.
zh: 钱都花光了，我们开始找工作。

en: All the money put together still won't be enough.
zh: 所有的钱加起来还是不够。

en: Should I insert coins first?
zh: 我应该先投币吗？

en: Will you lend me some money?
zh: 你能借我点钱吗？

en: I have got some money.
zh: 我有一些钱。

en: Give me a little money.
zh: 给我一点钱。

en: We should not make too much of money.
zh: 我们不应该太看重钱。

en: It is against my principles to borrow money.
zh: 借钱有违我的原则。

en: Is it possible to borrow money?
zh: 有可能借到钱吗？

en: I ran all over town trying to borrow some money.
zh: 我跑遍全城想借点钱。

en: People with money were able to buy butter.
zh: 有钱人才能买得起黄油。

en: You may spend or save at will.
zh: 你可以随意花钱或存钱。

en: Spending money is as easy as pie.
zh: 花钱易如反掌。

en: I wish I had more money with me.
zh: 我希望我身上有更多的钱。

en: With all his money, he is not happy.
zh: 他有那么多钱，却不快乐。

en: You had better not waste your money.
zh: 你最好不要浪费你的钱。

en: I have a lot of money.
zh: 我有很多钱。

en: Please leave some money.
zh: 请留下一些钱。

en: If you have any money, please lend me some.
zh: 如果你有钱，请借我一些。

en: Can I borrow some money from you?
zh: 我可以向你借点钱吗？

en: It goes without saying that health is above wealth.
zh: 毫无疑问，健康胜于财富。

en: I don't have much money, but I can get along somehow.
zh: 我没有多少钱，但我还能凑合着过。

en: I'll give you back the money tomorrow.
zh: 我明天会把钱还给你。

en: Lend money only to such as will repay it.
zh: 只借钱给那些会还钱的人。

en: Money is used for buying or selling goods, measuring value and storing wealth.
zh: 货币用于买卖商品、衡量价值和储存财富。

en: You should be careful of your money.
zh: 你应该小心你的钱。

en: The money amounts to almost two thousands dollars.
zh: 这笔钱总共有近两千美元。

en: You must make good use of money.
zh: 你必须好好利用金钱。

en: You cannot substitute money for health.
zh: 你不能用金钱代替健康。

en: Money will do anything.
zh: 金钱能办到任何事。

en: You should turn money to good use.
zh: 你应该好好利用金钱。

en: How much money do you have?

en: Money answers all things.

en: If you have any money with you, please lend me some.

en: Do you have any money with you?

en: Can you imagine the world without money?

en: Some people write books for money, others for pleasure.

en: If she continues to live with a man she doesn't love for his money, the day will come when she will be utterly frustrated and between the devil and the deep blue sea.
zh: 如果她继续为了钱和一个不爱的男人生活在一起，总有一天她会感到彻底沮丧，进退两难。

en: Stop arguing about money.

en: Money counts for little.

en: Money, as such, has no meaning.

en: Moving money and technology from one side of the globe to the other is not enough.
zh: 仅仅把资金和技术从地球的一端转移到另一端是不够的。

en: I want money.

en: If you need money, I'll lend you some.

en: Love is as important to me as money is to her.
zh: 爱对我来说和钱对她来说一样重要。

en: Do you need much money?

en: Money has changed his life.

en: I am running short of money.
zh: 我快没钱了。

en: Lack of money brought my travel plans to an end.

en: I can't do it for want of money.

en: If I had enough money, I could buy this book.

en: It is generally believed that money brings happiness.

en: I have run short of money.

en: Our money ran out.

en: I can't buy it for lack for money.

en: We could not continue our journey for lack of money.

en: It goes without saying that money is not everything.

en: If you need some money, why don't you borrow some from your mother?

en: You can withdraw some money out of the bank, if you need any.
zh: 如果你需要钱，你可以从银行取一些出来。

en: The idea that money can buy everything is wrong.

en: Had I had enough money, I would have bought that computer.
zh: 如果我有足够的钱，我早就买那台电脑了。

en: Now that I have enough money, I can get that camera.
zh: 现在我有足够的钱了，可以买那个相机了。

en: I'm very happy to make your acquaintance.
zh: 很高兴认识你。

en: I'm glad to know you.
zh: 很高兴认识你。

en: If you are not in a hurry, please stay a little longer.
zh: 如果您不着急，请多留一会儿。

en: How about cup of tea or something, if you aren't in a hurry?

en: How was your holiday?

en: The holiday was up very quickly.
zh: 假期过得真快。

en: Good night and sweet dreams.
zh: 晚安，祝你做个好梦。

en: We have a parking lot for the customers.
zh: 我们为顾客提供停车场。

en: You mustn't keep your guest waiting outside.

en: What about you? Will you have orange juice, too?

en: The visitor has gone away five minutes before you came back.
zh: 在你回来之前，访客已经走了五分钟了。

en: Have all the passengers got on board yet?

en: Our guests should be here within an hour.
zh: 我们的客人应该在一个小时内到达。

en: Is there a doctor in the house?

zh: 赢得客户的信任和尊重是本公司的目标。

en: Please write down your home address.
zh: 请写下你的家庭住址。

en: We are trying to clarify your future procurement requirements.

en: We aim to please.

zh: 先生，您把打火机落在桌子上了。

en: We have to take great pains to make our guests feel comfortable.

en: The guests were waited on by a highly trained team of young staff.
zh: 客人们由训练有素的年轻员工团队侍候。

zh: 顾客们被迫在雨中等了好几个小时。

en: We must keep the customers satisfied.

en: The guests listened to a number of speeches.

en: We had no customers, so we shut the shop early.

en: A customer came and so tea was brewed.
zh: 来了一个顾客，所以就煮了茶。

en: A customer is having his shoes shined on a slapped-together stand.
zh: 一位顾客正在一个简陋的摊位上擦鞋。

en: We sold the store for want of customers.

en: Did I hurt your feelings?

en: I am sorry for you.
zh: 我为你感到难过。

en: I'm sorry for you.
zh: 我为你感到难过。

en: Sorry, but you must have the wrong number.

en: Did I hurt your feelings? I meant no harm.
zh: 我伤到你感情了吗？我没有恶意。

en: How would you like it?

en: Glad you like it.
zh: 你喜欢就好。

en: Don't forget to take your umbrella when you leave.

en: Give me a telephone call when you get back.

en: Welcome home.
zh: 欢迎回家。

en: Will you do me a favor?
zh: 你能帮我个忙吗？

en: I wonder if you could do me a favor.
zh: 我想知道你能不能帮我个忙。

en: Please be quiet for mercy's sake during the lesson.

en: Be an angel and turn the radio down.

en: For the love of Heaven, don't get angry.

en: Don't refer to this matter again, please.

en: For God's sake don't tell it to anyone.

en: I'd like to ask a favor of you.

en: Could you do me a favor? Will you lend me some money?

en: I do beseech you, hear me through.

en: Thank you for sending the product information asked for.
zh: 谢谢你发送我所要求的产品信息。

en: Please hurry up!

en: Your face is familiar to me.

en: Come nearer so that I can see your face.
zh: 靠近一点，这样我才能看清你的脸。

en: I'm afraid you have the wrong number.
zh: 恐怕你打错电话了。

en: Here is your bill.

en: The poor educational policy is a detriment to Japan.
zh: 糟糕的教育政策对日本不利。

en: Won't you sit down?

en: Please take your seat.

en: You're enjoying yourself.
zh: 你玩得很开心。

en: Please pay the cashier.

en: It's nice to meet you.

en: I'm very happy to meet you.
zh: 我很高兴认识你。

en: How glad I am to see you!

en: I'm charmed to meet you.

en: It was a pleasure to meet you.

en: Please help yourself to the sweets.

en: Is this all you have, sir?

en: How many pieces of baggage do you have?

en: I take lessons in flower arrangement.

en: Shall I change the water for the flowers?

en: Do come and see us when you are free.

en: It's time to be going.

en: Would you bring me some salt?

en: Could you please pass me the salt?

en: I have heard quite a lot about you.

en: Would you care for drinks?

en: Do you want something to drink?

en: I'd like to say yes, but...

en: Certainly. I'd be glad to.

en: Did you go to see a doctor?

en: The doctor told you to stay in bed until your fever goes down, didn't he?

en: My sides ache, doctor.

en: If you need to go off-line, that is fine.

en: I have something to live for in music.

en: Oranges are sweeter than lemons.

en: Oranges have a high vitamin content.

en: It was so sour an orange that I could not eat it.

en: Oranges contain a lot of vitamin C.

en: The price of oranges has come down.

en: Oranges are rich in vitamin C.

en: I'd like orange juice.

en: Orange juice, and two eggs over easy.

zh: “橙色卡”可以从售票员那里买到。

en: You're barking up the wrong tree.

en: I don't see anything.

en: Am I not right?

en: Don't take it out on me.
zh: 别朝我发火。

en: I do not know the meaning of hatred.

en: We will go but you won't.

en: Mr. Brown, a friend from Oregon, will visit us tomorrow.
zh: 来自俄勒冈的朋友布朗先生明天将拜访我们。

en: I was nicely framed.

en: I farted in class and the teacher threw me out.
zh: 我在课堂上放了个屁，老师把我赶出去了。

zh: 奥尔德斯·赫胥黎认为，无聊是人类最危险的状态之一。

en: Can you play the organ?
zh: 你会弹风琴吗？

en: The Olympic Games are held every four years.
zh: 奥林匹克运动会每四年举办一次。

en: The most important thing in the Olympic Games is not winning but taking part.
zh: 奥林匹克运动会最重要的不是获胜，而是参与。

en: The important thing about the Olympic Games is not to win, but to take part in them.
zh: 关于奥林匹克运动会，重要的不是获胜，而是参与其中。

en: The vision of the Olympics had sustained him.
zh: 对奥运会的憧憬一直支持着他。

en: The Olympic Games take place at intervals of four years.
zh: 奥林匹克运动会每四年举行一次。

en: What are the origins of the Olympics?

en: Preparations are already under way for the Olympic Games.
zh: 奥运会的准备工作已经在进行中。

en: The most important thing in the Olympics is not to win but to participate.
zh: 奥运会最重要的不是获胜，而是参与。

en: In Olympic competitions, a gold medal is for first place, a silver medal for second, and a bronze medal is for third place.
zh: 在奥运比赛中，金牌是给第一名的，银牌是给第二名的，铜牌是给第三名的。

en: I have a lot of discharge.
zh: 我有很多分泌物。

en: Olivier acted the part of Hamlet.
zh: 奥利维尔扮演了哈姆雷特这个角色。

en: You should free those animals from the cage.
zh: 你应该把那些动物从笼子里放出来。

en: Oil is extracted from olives.
zh: 油是从橄榄中提取的。

en: An olive branch symbolizes peace.
zh: 橄榄枝象征着和平。

en: We'd like to order 18 tonnes of olive oil.
zh: 我们想订购18吨橄榄油。

en: I feel a lot better now, but I know Dad's going to be real upset.
zh: 我现在感觉好多了，但我知道爸爸会非常难过。

en: Dutch is closely related to German.
zh: 荷兰语与德语密切相关。

en: I had never seen a windmill until I visited the Netherlands.
zh: 在我访问荷兰之前，我从未见过风车。

en: The Netherlands is a small country.
zh: 荷兰是一个小国。

en: Go where you will in Holland, you will see windmills.
zh: 无论你去荷兰的哪里，你都会看到风车。

en: What's their approximate worth?
zh: 它们的大概价值是多少？

en: In about two weeks.
zh: 大约两周后。

en: Have you finished it already?
zh: 你已经做完了吗？

en: My heavens, what an enormous box!
zh: 我的天啊，好大的一个箱子！

en: I had some custard pudding for an afternoon snack.
zh: 我下午茶吃了一些奶油布丁。

en: Good night, Mom.
zh: 妈妈，晚安。

en: Good night, sleep tight.
zh: 晚安，祝你睡个好觉。

en: Father does gardening whenever he gets a chance.
zh: 爸爸一有空就做园艺。

en: Well really, you are always repeating the same mistake.
zh: 真是的，你总是犯同样的错误。

en: Oh my! Is she weeping for joy?
zh: 哎呀！她喜极而泣吗？

en: Oh, you've been to the barbershop.
zh: 哦，你去理发店了。

en: Oh, you are early this morning.
zh: 哦，你今天早上真早。

en: Well, I declare!
zh: 哎呀，真是的！

en: It's really different from what I expected.
zh: 这和我想象的真不一样。

en: The toy department is on the fifth floor.
zh: 玩具部在五楼。

en: Put away your toys.
zh: 把你的玩具收起来。

en: Gather your toys together.
zh: 把你的玩具收拾好。

en: Military toys are abundant in the shops.
zh: 商店里有很多军事玩具。

en: The toy train went around the room.
zh: 玩具火车绕着房间转。

en: The picnic was canceled for lack of interest.
zh: 因为缺乏兴趣，野餐取消了。

en: Any book will do as long as it is amusing.
zh: 只要有趣，什么书都可以。

en: If it is interesting, any book will do.
zh: 只要有趣，什么书都可以。

en: Most funny stories are based on comic situations.
zh: 大多数有趣的故事都基于喜剧性的情境。

en: Mario's Pub is where the action is.
zh: 马里奥酒吧是热闹的地方。

en: Any book will do, so long as it is interesting.
zh: 只要有趣，什么书都可以。

en: Tell me truly what you think.
zh: 告诉我你真实的想法。

en: I don't want to remember. I feel I'll go mad through rage.
zh: 我不想回忆。我觉得我会气疯的。

en: I hear you Irish are a bunch of drinkin' fools.
zh: 我听说你们爱尔兰人都是一群酒鬼。

en: Ask the policeman the way.
zh: 向警察问路。

en: The patrolman motioned me to pull over.
zh: 巡警示意我靠边停车。

en: What is more, he has a strong will.
zh: 更重要的是，他意志坚强。

en: On top of that, it was raining.
zh: 而且，当时还在下雨。

en: Also, there is a greater risk of accidents.
zh: 此外，发生事故的风险也更大。

en: It's high time you children went to bed.
zh: 孩子们，你们早该睡觉了。

en: You are under arrest.
zh: 你被捕了。

en: I'll shut you out.
zh: 我会把你关在外面。

en: I will make a man of you.
zh: 我会把你培养成一个真正的男子汉。

en: I don't want to hear you speak.
zh: 我不想听到你说话。

en: I don't want to see your faces.
zh: 我不想看到你们的脸。

en: You are stupid, and so is he.
zh: 你很蠢，他也一样。

en: Never lose your fighting fists.
zh: 永远不要失去你的斗志。

en: Quit sitting on the fence and make a decision!

en: Hold your tongue! You talk too much!

en: You're fired.

en: You are too young to travel alone.
zh: 你太年轻了，不能独自旅行。

en: How lazy you are!

en: Now that you are no longer young, you must think of your future.
zh: 既然你不再年轻了，你必须考虑你的未来。

en: You are no longer a child.
zh: 你不再是个孩子了。

en: How does it happen that you were not eaten up with all those hundreds and trillions of cats?

en: You are trying to kill me.
zh: 你想杀了我。

en: What are you eyeing?

en: Put your coat on my account.
zh: 把你的外套算在我账上。

en: It's to see your face well.
zh: 就是想好好看看你的脸。

en: What is your riddle?

en: Ask her if she'll sew up the hole in your jeans.
zh: 问问她能不能帮你把牛仔裤上的洞补上。

en: The sight of you is an abomination to me.
zh: 看到你就让我厌恶。

en: I shouldn't have told you nothin'.
zh: 我不该什么都告诉你的。

en: That is a fine fix you have got us into.
zh: 你可真是把我们害惨了。

en: A boy your age ought to behave well.
zh: 你这么大的孩子应该懂事。

en: It was careless of you to forget your homework.
zh: 你忘了做作业真是太粗心了。

en: Get back to where you started.
zh: 回到你开始的地方。

en: I know you're working part-time.
zh: 我知道你在做兼职。

en: The man who nearly drowned began to breathe.
zh: 那个差点淹死的人开始呼吸了。

en: The drowning man called for help, but in vain.
zh: 溺水的人呼救，但无济于事。

en: The opera singer held a charity concert of his own accord.
zh: 那位歌剧演员自愿举办了一场慈善演唱会。

en: The opera starts at seven.

en: May you both be happy!

en: My mother always puts my sister before me.
zh: 我妈妈总是把我妹妹放在我前面。

en: We arrived at the office on time.
zh: 我们准时到达了办公室。

en: There is a friendly atmosphere in the office.
zh: 办公室里气氛很友好。

en: The office was closed for 10 days for the New Year's holiday.
zh: 办公室因新年假期关闭了10天。

en: Ophelia wishes Hamlet were still in love with her.
zh: 奥菲莉亚希望哈姆雷特仍然爱着她。

zh: 太阳终于在中午左右冲破了云层。

en: People were gathering in a huge mass.

en: Good morning, my sweet dog.

en: Good morning. It's time to wake up.
zh: 早上好，该起床了。

en: Good morning, Mike.
zh: 早上好，迈克。

en: My aunt was coming to see us the next day.
zh: 我姑妈第二天要来看我们。

en: My aunt is none the happier for her great wealth.
zh: 我姑妈有了这么多钱，也并没有更快乐。

en: My aunt was pleased with my success.
zh: 我姑妈对我的成功感到高兴。

en: My aunt brought me some flowers.
zh: 我姑妈给我带了一些花。

en: My aunt allowed me to park my car in her parking space.
zh: 我姑妈允许我把车停在她的停车位上。

en: My aunt speaks Chinese as well as English.

en: My aunt showed me how to make good coffee.
zh: 我姑妈教我如何煮好咖啡。

en: I went there with my aunt last month.
zh: 上个月我和我姑妈一起去了那里。

en: What a feast we had when we visited my aunt!
zh: 我们去看望我姑妈的时候，吃了一顿多么丰盛的大餐啊！

en: His aunt's apple pie was delicious and he had a second helping.
zh: 他姑妈做的苹果派很好吃，他还吃了第二份。

en: Aunt, this is Tom.
zh: 姑妈，这位是汤姆。

en: My aunt has three children.
zh: 我姑妈有三个孩子。

en: My aunt had been in the hospital for a week when I visited her.
zh: 我去看望我姑妈的时候，她已经在医院住了一个星期了。

en: My aunt sent me a birthday present.
zh: 我姑妈寄给我一份生日礼物。

en: My aunt gave me a camera.
zh: 我姑妈送给我一台照相机。

en: My aunt will come here for a week.
zh: 我姑妈会来这里住一个星期。

en: Won't you come in for a cup of tea?
zh: 进来喝杯茶怎么样？

en: My grandma stooped down and picked up a needle and thread.
zh: 我奶奶弯下腰，捡起一根针和线。

en: Grandmother looks very comfortable in that chair beside the fire.
zh: 奶奶坐在火炉边的椅子上，看起来很舒服。

en: Grandmother takes great delight in watching television.
zh: 奶奶很喜欢看电视。

en: The family was shook up when the grandmother died unexpectedly.
zh: 奶奶意外去世时，全家都震惊了。

en: My grandma injured her leg in a fall.
zh: 我奶奶摔了一跤，伤了腿。

en: It is mean of him to deceive an elderly lady.
zh: 他欺骗一位老妇人是很卑鄙的。

en: The old lady is bound to fart.
zh: 老太太肯定要放屁了。

en: The old lady got down from the bus.
zh: 老太太下了公共汽车。

en: An old lady moved to place next door.
zh: 一位老太太搬到了隔壁。

en: The Canadian chopped down the tree with an ax.
zh: 那个加拿大人用斧头砍倒了那棵树。

en: It's self-evident.
zh: 这是不言而喻的。

en: Each building has a name.
zh: 每栋建筑都有一个名字。

en: Time to go beddy-byes, dear.
zh: 该睡觉了，亲爱的。

en: Tiger lilies are one species of the lily family.
zh: 虎皮百合是百合科的一个品种。

en: My stomach hurts. Can I have some stomach medicine?
zh: 我肚子疼。能给我一些胃药吗？

en: I have a stomachache.
zh: 我肚子疼。

en: He said that he was hungry, and that he wanted to go home to dinner.
zh: 他说他饿了，想回家吃晚饭。

en: I was hungry.
zh: 我饿了。

en: If you are hungry, you can eat the bread.
zh: 如果你饿了，你可以吃面包。

en: Surprisingly, he swims even on cold days.
zh: 令人惊讶的是，即使在寒冷的日子里他也游泳。

en: I want to teach history when I grow up.
zh: 我长大后想教历史。

en: You can stay here as long as you keep quiet.
zh: 只要你保持安静，你就可以留在这里。

en: If you are a good boy, I will give you this watch.
zh: 如果你是个好孩子，我就把这块手表给你。

en: Some are moderate; some are radical.
zh: 有些是温和的；有些是激进的。

en: He departed for London the day before yesterday.
zh: 他前天出发去伦敦了。

en: My friends came to see me the day before yesterday.
zh: 我的朋友们前天来看我了。

en: It was stormy the day before yesterday.
zh: 前天有暴风雨。

en: I went there the day before yesterday.
zh: 我前天去了那里。

en: The day before yesterday he witnessed a weird incident in the wilderness.
zh: 前天他在荒野中目睹了一件奇怪的事情。

en: He hung his head sheepishly.
zh: 他羞怯地低下了头。

en: Tell her you like her. Don't be afraid. She won't bite you.
zh: 告诉她你喜欢她。别害怕。她不会咬你的。

en: He's not really your father. Heh-heh.
zh: 他不是你的亲生父亲。呵呵。

en: She and I have been married 30 years.
zh: 我和她结婚三十年了。

en: Keep the change, driver.

en: Well then why are you laughing?

en: Her breasts don't give much milk yet.

en: Oops, my pen has run out of ink.

en: Wait until further notice.

en: What you said does not make sense.

en: Your meaning didn't come across clearly.
zh: 你没表达清楚你的意思。

en: I really understand what you mean.

en: I think what you say is true.

en: Admitting what you say, I still think he's in the right.

en: I can't go along with what you said.

zh: 牛津队看起来胜券在握。

en: How long are you going to stay in Oxford?

en: Oh! It's my day.

en: Ottawa is the capital of Canada.

en: A gentle wind was blowing.

zh: 蝌蚪长大后，尾巴会消失，腿开始形成。

en: Don't judge each other by the color of the skin.

en: There's no reason to panic. Just handle it quickly.

en: The destruction of the ozone layer affects the environment.

zh: 请问，能不能麻烦你帮我抬一下那个箱子？

en: The chances are that she'll quit her job.

en: I dare say she is still in Japan.

en: It is probable that her first album will sell well.

en: Ten to one he will succeed.

en: No doubt he will pass the examination.

en: The chances are he's already heard the news.

en: It is conceivable that he knows the rumor.

en: It is likely to be fine.

en: His team is likely to win.

en: Records are particularly scarce for this era, perhaps owing to a long series of natural disasters which befell the capital.
zh: 这个时代的记录特别稀少，可能是由于首都发生了一系列自然灾害。

en: Politics is perhaps the only profession for which no preparation is thought necessary.
zh: 政治或许是唯一一个人们认为不需要任何准备的职业。

en: Maybe you'll succeed.

en: He observed that it would probably rain.

en: In all likelihood, we shall be away for a few days.

en: I dare say it is a lie.

en: I think you've got the flu.

en: There is, perhaps, not one of our natural passions so hard to subdue as vanity.

en: Perhaps it is only in childhood that books have any deep influence on our lives.
zh: 也许只有在童年时期，书籍才会对我们的生活产生深刻的影响。

en: To make an excuse for having stayed out late.
zh: 为晚归找借口。

en: It's too late. I'll see you home.

en: What would you recommend we eat?

en: Are there any types of cuisine or restaurants that you could recommend?

en: What do you recommend?

en: Which course do you recommend?

en: I have been to the station to see my uncle off.
zh: 我去车站送我的叔叔了。

en: I've had a show.

en: I stand corrected.

en: Stop talking and listen to me.

en: Cut the talking and listen.

en: Stop chattering and finish your work.
zh: 别闲聊了，完成你的工作。

en: Cut the chit-chat and get to work.
zh: 别闲聊了，开始工作吧。

zh: 多嘴的人总是泄露秘密，危害他人的利益。

en: Let's attend to our work instead of talking.
zh: 我们还是专心工作吧，别说话了。

zh: 除了他太爱说话之外，我喜欢他。

en: Let's quit and go home.

en: Could you bring me another hot towel?
zh: 可以再给我拿一条热毛巾吗？

en: Do you have hot towels?

en: My uncle will have been in New York for two years next month.
zh: 下个月我叔叔就来纽约两年了。

en: My uncle said that he jogs every morning.
zh: 我叔叔说他每天早上都慢跑。

en: Whenever my uncle comes, he brings some nice things for us.
zh: 每次我叔叔来，他都会给我们带些好东西。

en: My uncle gave me a book.

en: My uncle gave me a book yesterday. This is the book.
zh: 我叔叔昨天给了我一本书。就是这本书。

en: My uncle gave me a present.
zh: 我叔叔给了我一件礼物。

en: My uncle brought a new TV set for us.
zh: 我叔叔给我们带来了一台新的电视机。

en: My uncle is staying in Hong Kong at present.
zh: 我叔叔目前住在香港。

en: My uncle now lives in comfort.
zh: 我叔叔现在生活很舒适。

en: My uncle has a deep interest in art.
zh: 我叔叔对艺术有浓厚的兴趣。

en: My uncle retired from teaching last year, but he still managed to hang onto a position at the university.
zh: 我叔叔去年从教职退休了，但他仍然设法在大学里保留了一个职位。

en: My uncle is generous with his money.
zh: 我叔叔用钱很慷慨。

en: My uncle lives near the school.
zh: 我叔叔住在学校附近。

en: My uncle has a flower shop near the station.
zh: 我叔叔在车站附近有一家花店。

en: My uncle made a fortune.

en: My uncle runs a hotel.

en: My uncle gave me the watch.
zh: 我叔叔把这块手表给了我。

en: My uncle is slender, but my aunt is stout.
zh: 我叔叔很苗条，但我婶婶很胖。

en: My uncle always did well by us.
zh: 我叔叔总是对我们很好。

en: My uncle constantly causes his family trouble.
zh: 我叔叔总是给他的家人带来麻烦。

en: My uncle lives in Madrid, the capital of Spain.
zh: 我叔叔住在西班牙首都马德里。

en: It was necessary that my uncle should be informed.
zh: 有必要通知我叔叔。

en: My uncle called on a woman.
zh: 我叔叔拜访了一位女士。

en: Our uncle bought us movie tickets.
zh: 我叔叔给我们买了电影票。

en: My uncle is staying with us this week.
zh: 我叔叔这周和我们住在一起。

en: Grandfather talked to me with a pipe in his mouth.
zh: 爷爷嘴里叼着烟斗和我说话。

en: Did your uncle let you drive his car?
zh: 你叔叔让你开他的车了吗？

en: My uncle has a large family.
zh: 我叔叔有一个大家庭。

en: My uncle bought me a watch, which keeps good time.
zh: 我叔叔给我买了一块表，走时很准。

en: I got an old Toyota from my uncle.
zh: 我从叔叔那里得到了一辆旧丰田。

en: My uncle gave me a camera.
zh: 我叔叔给了我一台照相机。

en: My uncle blew in from Kobe.
zh: 我叔叔从神户突然来了。

en: My uncle came to see me.
zh: 我叔叔来看我了。

en: We haven't been able to find out anything about Grandma and Grandpa.
zh: 我们一直没能找到关于奶奶和爷爷的任何消息。

en: Grandpa fell down the stairs and got a serious injury.
zh: 爷爷从楼梯上摔下来，受了重伤。

en: Grandfather sat in his habitual place near the fire.
zh: 爷爷坐在他平时习惯的火炉旁的位置上。

en: Grandfather speaks very slowly.
zh: 爷爷说话很慢。

en: The old man named the wooden doll Pinocchio.
zh: 那个老人给木偶取名叫匹诺曹。

en: My grandfather is a bit hard of hearing.
zh: 我爷爷有点耳背。

en: My grandfather is five times as old as I am.
zh: 我爷爷的年龄是我的五倍。

en: I take care of my grandfather.
zh: 我照顾我的爷爷。

en: His grandfather bought him the expensive toy.
zh: 他的爷爷给他买了那个昂贵的玩具。

en: Pride goes before a fall.
zh: 骄兵必败。

en: Pride will have a fall.
zh: 骄兵必败。

en: Pride comes before a fall.
zh: 骄兵必败。

en: It is wiser to make no reply to angry words.
zh: 对愤怒的话语不作回应是明智的。

en: Don't breathe a word of it to anyone.
zh: 不要对任何人透露一个字。

en: I did nothing out of the ordinary.
zh: 我没有做什么特别的事情。

en: Rice gruel is easy to digest.
zh: 粥很容易消化。

en: No, I changed it.
zh: 不，我改过了。

en: That's funny. The speaker is crackling.
zh: 真好笑。扬声器有噼啪声。

en: It saved me.
zh: 它救了我。

en: They're all fine, thank you.
zh: 他们都很好，谢谢。

en: Thank you very much for your help.
zh: 非常感谢你的帮助。

en: I'm fine, thank you.
zh: 我很好，谢谢。

en: The aurora is a phenomenon characteristic of the polar regions.
zh: 极光是极地地区特有的现象。

en: Like All Ball, this one doesn't have a tail.
zh: 像所有球一样，这个也没有尾巴。

en: When the All Blacks came out onto the field a roar like 'woooaahh' swept over the crowd.
zh: 当全黑队出现在球场上时，人群中爆发出像“哇”一样的欢呼声。

en: Listening to oldies reminds me of my hometown.
zh: 听老歌让我想起我的家乡。

en: On the whole, the event was successful.
zh: 总的来说，这次活动是成功的。

en: On New Year's Eve, the trains will run all night.
zh: 在除夕夜，火车将通宵运营。

en: The exhibition games are over and the regular season finally begins.
zh: 表演赛结束了，常规赛终于开始了。

zh: 我们应该在烤箱里烤多久？

en: Galoshes are impervious to water.
zh: 套鞋是不透水的。

en: What is the charge for cleaning overcoats?
zh: 清洗大衣的费用是多少？

zh: 老板们任命他为经理。

zh: 老板们请来了一个刽子手，解雇了所有同情工会的人。

en: The new restaurant was making the owners money hand over fist.
zh: 这家新餐厅让老板们赚得盆满钵满。

en: Automation is bound to have important social consequences.
zh: 自动化必然会产生重要的社会影响。

en: Why don't you have your motorcycle fixed up?
zh: 你为什么不把你的摩托车修好呢？

en: Motorcycles are very cheap.
zh: 摩托车很便宜。

en: The motorcycle started in pursuit at breakneck speed.
zh: 摩托车开始以极快的速度追赶。

en: It's fun to ride a motorcycle.
zh: 骑摩托车很有趣。

en: I wish I could buy a motorcycle.

en: Before we examine Emmet's theory, we must clarify the concept of 'internal symmetry.'

en: Emmet's theory appears repeatedly in these papers.

en: I should point out that it is necessary to re-examine the validity of Emmet's theory.

en: Although much research has been carried out into the applications of Emmet's theory, little is known about their feasibility.
zh: 虽然已经对埃米特理论的应用进行了大量研究，但对其可行性的了解甚少。

en: The impact of Emmet's theory on physics has been widely discussed, but this is not my concern in this paper.

en: It should be emphasized that Emmet's theory yielded a number of byproducts in the process of application.
zh: 应该强调的是，埃米特理论在应用过程中产生了一些副产品。

en: It is not my purpose to investigate the impact of Emmet's theory on biology.

en: The major result from recent investigations of Emmet's theory has been that it can be applied to biochemistry as well.

en: It is beyond the scope of the present work to describe all the components that comprise Emmet's architectural style.

en: I would like to focus attention on the particular design that best represents Emmet's concept.

en: It is certain that Emmet contrived his 'dyad' style to facilitate the process of architectural design.
zh: 可以肯定的是，埃米特设计了他的“二元”风格，以方便建筑设计过程。

zh: 是的，我认识她。我很敬佩她。

en: Yes, I think it's okay.
zh: 是的，我觉得可以。

en: Gee, unbelievable!
zh: 哇，难以置信！

en: "Is it the first time you've been here?" "Yes, it's my first visit."
zh: “这是你第一次来这里吗？” “是的，我第一次来。”

en: Yes, I went yesterday.
zh: 是的，我昨天去了。

en: Yes, I think you ought to go.
zh: 是的，我觉得你应该去。

en: Yeah. I think so, too.
zh: 是啊。我也是这么想的。

en: Yes, he did. He really looked like a doctor.
zh: 是的，他的确像。他看起来真的很像医生。

en: What? It's only eleven? We still have an hour to go before lunch.
zh: 什么？才十一点？我们离午饭还有一个小时呢。

en: Yes, it's such a lovely night.
zh: 是的，今晚真是一个美好的夜晚。

en: Yes, he's almost as tall as I am.
zh: 是的，他几乎和我一样高。

en: Yes, please come.
zh: 好的，请来吧。

en: Yeah, but I'll have to take the rap if they slip up.
zh: 是啊，但是如果他们搞砸了，我得负责。

en: Yes, but you do not have to stay to the end.
zh: 是的，但是你不必待到最后。

en: Oh, it's just that I never meet any interesting men.
zh: 哦，只是我从来没有遇到过任何有趣的男人。

en: Well, yes, but I don't want anyone to know.
zh: 嗯，是的，但是我不想让任何人知道。

en: OK. Let me give you my number.
zh: 好的。我把我的号码给你。

en: Yes, orange juice, please.
zh: 好的，请给我橙汁。

en: Yes. And it's only a hop, skip and a jump to the nearest mall.
zh: 是的。而且去最近的购物中心非常近，几步就到。

en: Yes, this is Anthony.
zh: 是的，我是安东尼。

en: Yes, I've been there a couple of times.
zh: 是的，我去过几次。

en: Mt. Everest is 29,002 feet above sea level.
zh: 珠穆朗玛峰海拔29002英尺。

en: There were six children in the Evans family.
zh: 埃文斯家有六个孩子。

en: Amy made an effort to stand up.
zh: 艾米努力站起来。

en: Amy walks to the station every morning.
zh: 艾米每天早上步行去车站。

en: Amy worked in the yard last Saturday.
zh: 艾米上周六在院子里干活。

en: Amy looked at me smiling.
zh: 艾米看着我，面带微笑。

en: Amy wants something new to wear.
zh: 艾米想买件新衣服穿。

en: How did Amy look?
zh: 艾米看起来怎么样？

en: The stories written by Amy Church are all interesting.
zh: 艾米·丘奇写的故事都很有趣。

en: I can't keep track of all the changes taking place in the world of AIDS research.
zh: 我无法追踪艾滋病研究领域发生的所有变化。

en: AIDS can be stopped only if every person decides to take action against it.
zh: 只有每个人都决定采取行动对抗艾滋病，艾滋病才能被阻止。

en: I had an AIDS test.
zh: 我做过艾滋病检测。

en: The number of people suffering from AIDS has increased.
zh: 患有艾滋病的人数增加了。

en: AIDS has broken out.
zh: 艾滋病爆发了。

en: I have a dream that AIDS will be cured in my lifetime.
zh: 我有一个梦想，在我有生之年艾滋病会被治愈。

en: Where is the Avis counter?
zh: Avis的柜台在哪里？

en: I'd like to try out the aerobics class for a day.
zh: 我想试上一天的健美操课。

en: I'd like to try aerobics.
zh: 我想试试健美操。

en: Aerobics is all the fashion.
zh: 健美操现在很流行。

en: Where do the airport buses leave from?
zh: 机场巴士在哪里出发？

en: I want a compact car with an air conditioner.
zh: 我想要一辆带空调的紧凑型汽车。

en: Do you mind if I turn off the AC?
zh: 你介意我把空调关了吗？

en: Please turn up the air conditioner.
zh: 请把空调调高一点。

en: Don't leave the air conditioner on.
zh: 别让空调开着。

en: The air conditioner doesn't work.
zh: 空调坏了。

en: Without an air conditioner, people nowadays cannot live.
zh: 现在的人没有空调没法活。

en: The air-conditioner isn't taking in enough air.
zh: 空调进气不足。

en: Well... My house isn't big enough.
zh: 嗯...我家不够大。

en: Really? I had locked it up before I went out.
zh: 真的吗？我出门前锁好了啊。

en: He had no luck in finding work.
zh: 他找工作不顺利。

en: By good fortune, they escaped.
zh: 幸好，他们逃脱了。

en: I wish I had much money.
zh: 我希望我有很多钱。

en: Yes. I have to read it by tomorrow.
zh: 是的。我明天之前必须看完。

en: Yes. We should be very careful.
zh: 是的。我们应该非常小心。

en: Yes. Everyone admires the pictures painted by him.
zh: 是的。大家都欣赏他画的画。

en: Mm-hm. I think so too.
zh: 嗯哼。我也是这么想的。

en: Yeah, sometimes they do.
zh: 是啊，有时候他们会那样做。

en: Oh, I'll probably just stay home.
zh: 哦，我可能就待在家里。

en: Yes, I'll come, Bob.
zh: 好的，我会来的，鲍勃。

en: Oh, just over the holidays.
zh: 哦，就在假期里。

en: Oh, I haven't decided what I'm going to do yet.
zh: 哦，我还没决定要做什么。

en: I know what.
zh: 我知道了。

en: The rumor proved true.
zh: 谣言被证实是真的。

en: The rumor proved to be true.
zh: 谣言被证实是真的。

en: The rumor proved to be an absolute lie.
zh: 谣言被证实是彻头彻尾的谎言。

en: The rumor spread far and wide.
zh: 谣言传得沸沸扬扬。
